Developer Terms of Use
des: FOX 55 Fort Wayne and the Severe Weather Center are your leading provider of weather forecasts, severe weather information, radar maps and air quality information in the Fort Wayne and Northeast Indiana areas, including Angola, Huntington, Decatur and Van Wert.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
